headline: These 2 Dividend Stocks Are Defying the Market Correction -- Are They Buys?
summary: Major stock market indexes are down significantly this year, with many of the most valuable companies in the world leading the descent.  CVS Health is up by 50%, while Medical Properties Trust's shares have risen 26%.  Medical Properties Trust (MPT), a healthcare-focused real estate investment trust (REIT), faced a significant headwind when one of its largest tenants, Steward Healthcare, defaulted on rent and filed for bankruptcy.
